channel.title: Python on air-sea interactions
channel.description: Recent content in Python on air-sea interactions

item.title: Basics
item.description: This is the code for python 2. There are some lines that do not work with python 3 because of the grammar changes. Basic introduction to python adapted from ‘data_containers.ipynb’ by Eric Firing at Univ. of Hawaii Let’s start with numbers. Numbers and Booleans Python’s system of numbers is quite simple: there are integers floating point numbers complex numbers Boolean (True or False) types The types are determined dynamically, so operations involving integers and floating point numbers yield floating point numbers.
